item.text: Then Moses went and spoke these words to all Israel.
He said to them, “Today I am 120 years old. I am no longer able to get about, and the Lord has said to me, ‘You will not cross the Jordan.’

As for the Lord your God, he is about to cross over before you; he will destroy these nations before you, and you will dispossess them. As for Joshua, he is about to cross before you just as the Lord has said.
The Lord will do to them just what he did to Sihon and Og, the Amorite kings, and to their land, which he destroyed.
The Lord will deliver them over to you, and you will do to them according to the whole commandment I have given you.
Be strong and courageous! Do not fear or tremble before them, for the Lord your God is the one who is going with you. He will not fail you or abandon you!”

Then Moses called out to Joshua in the presence of all Israel, “Be strong and courageous, for you will accompany these people to the land that the Lord promised to give their ancestors, and you will enable them to inherit it.
The Lord is indeed going before you—he will be with you; he will not fail you or abandon you. Do not be afraid or discouraged!”
Then Moses wrote down this law and gave it to the Levitical priests, who carry the ark of the Lord’s covenant, and to all Israel’s elders.

<st data-num="04872" class="">He</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> them: “At the <st data-num="07093" class="">end</st> of <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>, at the <st data-num="04150" class="">appointed</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">time</st> of the <st data-num="08059" class="">cancellation of debts</st>,<n id="2" /> at the <st data-num="02282" class="">Feast</st> of <st data-num="05521" class="">Shelters</st>,<n id="3" />
when all Israel comes to appear before the Lord your God in the place he chooses, you must read this law before them within their hearing.

Gather the people—men, women, and children, as well as the resident foreigners in your villages—so they may hear and thus learn about and fear the Lord your God and carefully obey all the words of this law.
Then their children, who have not known this law, will also hear about and learn to fear the Lord your God for as long as you live in the land you are crossing the Jordan to possess.”

Then the Lord said to Moses, “The day of your death is near. Summon Joshua and present yourselves in the tent of meeting so that I can commission him.” So Moses and Joshua presented themselves in the tent of meeting.
The Lord appeared in the tent in a pillar of cloud that stood above the door of the tent.

Then the Lord said to Moses, “You are about to die, and then these people will begin to prostitute themselves with the foreign gods of the land into which they are going. They will reject me and break my covenant that I have made with them.

At <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> my <st data-num="0639" class="">anger</st> will <st data-num="02734" class="">erupt</st> against them,<n id="2" /> and I will <st data-num="05800" class="">abandon</st> them and <st data-num="05641" class="">hide</st> my <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st> from <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st> until they <st data-num="01961" class="">are</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">devoured</st>. <st data-num="07227" class="">Many</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">disasters</st> and <st data-num="06869" class="">distresses</st> will <st data-num="04672" class="">overcome</st><n id="3" /> them<n id="4" /> so that they<n id="5" /> will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> at <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st>, ‘Have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">disasters</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="04672" class="">overcome</st> us<n id="7" /> <st data-num="05921 03588">because</st> our<n id="8" /> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">is not</st> <st data-num="07130" class="">among</st> us<n id="9" />?’

But <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="05640" class="">certainly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05641" class="">hide</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">myself</st> at <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">because of</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07451" class="">wickedness</st> they<n id="2" /> will have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">by</st> <st data-num="06437" class="">turning</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="03789" class="">write down</st> for yourselves the <st data-num="02063" class="">following</st> <st data-num="07892" class="">song</st> and <st data-num="03925" class="">teach</st> it to the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>. <st data-num="07760" class="">Put</st> it into their very <st data-num="06310" class="">mouths</st> <st data-num="04616" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07892" class="">song</st> may <st data-num="01961" class="">serve</st> as my <st data-num="05707" class="">witness</st> against the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>!

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> after I have <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> them<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st> I <st data-num="07650" class="">promised</st> to their<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st>—one <st data-num="02100" class="">flowing</st> with <st data-num="02461" class="">milk</st> and <st data-num="01706" class="">honey</st>—and they<n id="3" /> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> their <st data-num="07646" class="">fill</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="01878" class="">become fat</st>, then they<n id="5" /> will <st data-num="06437" class="">turn</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> and <st data-num="05647" class="">worship</st> them; they will <st data-num="05006" class="">reject</st> me and <st data-num="06565" class="">break</st> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st>.

<st data-num="01961" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">when</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">disasters</st> and <st data-num="06869" class="">distresses</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">overcome</st> them<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07892" class="">song</st> will <st data-num="06030 05707">testify</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">against</st> them,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> their<n id="4" /> <st data-num="06310 02233">descendants</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07911" class="">forget</st> it.<n id="5" /> I <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> the<n id="6" /> <st data-num="03336" class="">intentions</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">they</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">have in mind</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st>, even <st data-num="02962" class="">before</st> I <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> them<n id="8" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> I have <st data-num="07650" class="">promised</st>.”

So on <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="03789" class="">wrote down</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07892" class="">song</st> and <st data-num="03925" class="">taught</st> it to the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>,
and the Lord commissioned Joshua son of Nun, “Be strong and courageous, for you will take the Israelites to the land I have promised them, and I will be with you.”
When Moses finished writing on a scroll the words of this law in their entirety,
he commanded the Levites who carried the ark of the Lord’s covenant,
“Take this scroll of the law and place it beside the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God. It will remain there as a witness against you,

for I know about your rebellion and stubbornness. Indeed, even while I have been living among you to this very day, you have rebelled against the Lord; you will be even more rebellious after my death!

<st data-num="06950" class="">Gather</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="07626" class="">tribal</st> <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st> and <st data-num="07860" class="">officials</st> so I can <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> to <st data-num="0241" class="">them directly</st> about <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">things</st> and <st data-num="05749" class="">call</st> the <st data-num="08064" class="">heavens</st> and the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="05749" class="">to witness</st> against them.

For I know that after I die you will totally corrupt yourselves and turn away from the path I have commanded you to walk. Disaster will confront you in future days because you will act wickedly before the Lord, inciting him to anger because of your actions.”
Then Moses recited the words of this song from start to finish in the hearing of the whole assembly of Israel:
